dataSource: WebSearch aggregation (Trendlyne, MoneyControl, Screener, StockAnalysis, WhalesBook, Prysm)

Q2_FY2026.notes: Revenue grew 3.6% YoY. Net profit up 4% YoY. EBITDA dipped 1% from Rs 110 cr. Profit margin slightly decreased to 8.2% from 8.5%.

Q3_FY2026.notes: Revenue grew 10.6% YoY from Rs 1,268.65 cr. PAT decreased 5.2% from Rs 60.22 cr (impacted by one-time charge of Rs 22.11 cr for New Labour Codes). Underlying PAT grew 22.3%. Results approved Jan 28, 2026.

halfYearFY2026.notes: H1 FY2026 revenue growth muted at 1.3% YoY. PAT declined 14.3%.

FY2025.notes: Annual revenue growth of 14% is good

keyRatios.notes: PE at 86% premium to peers median of 26.71x. PB at 43% premium to peers median of 4.62x. Company is debt free.

balanceSheetHighlights.notes: Debt-free balance sheet. Strong position enabling stable earnings growth across cycles. Trading at premium to peers.

electricals.notes: Surged 26% YoY driven by volume expansion and higher copper prices

consumerDurables.notes: Fans, Water Heaters, Kitchen Appliances, Air Coolers

keyHighlights: Q3 FY26 revenue surged 10.6% but margins squeezed on input costs
One-time charge of Rs 22.11 cr for New Labour Codes impacted PAT
Underlying PAT growth of 22.3% when excluding exceptional items
Consumer sentiment subdued due to higher rainfall and GST disruptions
